column1: Little Goat Diner////Really loved grabbing lunch at Little Goat!  The service was slow (granted
column2: they are SUPER busy always) but they were really friendly.  The food was amazingly delicious.  We got nachos for the table (SO DELICIOUS
column4: I ordered a patty melt (amazingly good - everything about it was to die for) and I ended the meal with a 'choco taco' which is like a deconstructed ice cream taco that users sour cream ice cream and will blow your mind with your uniquely amazing it is.  Just trust me and get it.
